mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_item( item_num, user_num, item_name, item_price, item_description, item_stock) VALUES ( shop_item_seq.nextval, #{user_num}, #{item_name}, #{item_price}, #{item_description}, #{item_stock})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shop_item JOIN Auser_detail USING(user_num)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT item_num, user_num, name, item_name, item_regdate, item_modifydate, item_stock, item_description, item_price FROM shop_item JOIN auser_detail USING(user_num))a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
